infrastructure_stack: AWS EKS, RDS, ElastiCache, OpenSearch (via Terraform)
service_dependencies: All internal microservices; Stubs for critical external APIs (e.g., payment).
monitoring_tools: Full observability stack (Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Jaeger).
backup_strategy: Daily RDS snapshots, retained for 7 days.
cost_optimization: Scaled-down instance sizes; scheduled shutdowns on weekends.
maintenance_window: Nightly for data refresh and deployments.
